segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit the identifying number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) applying to the whole message.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information. In computer-to-computer exchanges free form text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to identify the routing and date of the schedule or availability information.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a location, e.g. place of departure/arrival.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) related to the location.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to define requested or available equipment.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to specify requested or available equipment and equipment size and type.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of requested or available pieces of equipment.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements, other than dimensions, associated with equipment, in terms of capacity.

segment.name: Dimensions
segment.documentation: DIM, A segment to specify dimensions applicable to equipment.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information associated with the equipment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to specify the schedule or availability selection criteria and to detail the schedule or availability information being provided.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate information related to the mode and means of transport, eg. specific conveyance/carrier.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s), e.g. earliest departure date/time, latest arrival date/time.

segment.name: Transport service requirements
segment.documentation: TSR, A segment to identify contract, conditions of carriage, services and priority requirements.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information related to the means of transport.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to identify the equipment requested/available.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, e.g. number of intermediate stops.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to indicate weight and/or volume selection criteria, e.g. minimum weight.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify the routing(s) and indicate corresponding date(s) and time(s).

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a location, e.g. place of departure/arrival.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) related to the location, e.g. date/time of scheduled departure/arrival.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to indicate all parties involved in the transaction and relevant locations, contacts and communication channels.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a place/location/sub-location and where relevant the function. The present location must be associated with the relevant party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communication channels, related to the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify the communication numbers of person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to describe the goods items for which schedule or availability is requested/provided.

segment.name: Goods item details
segment.documentation: GID, A segment to identify the goods item. A goods item can be identified by up to three levels of packaging within this segment.

segment.name: Handling instructions
segment.documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions relating to the goods item.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable information relating to the goods item.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to identify and describe the goods.

segment.name: Nature of cargo
segment.documentation: GDS, A segment to describe the nature of cargo.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to describe the goods in free form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify measurements applicable to the goods item.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements, other than dimensions, applicable to the goods item.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to which the measurement applies.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to specify dimensions applicable to the goods item.

segment.name: Dimensions
segment.documentation: DIM, A segment to specify dimensions applicable to the goods item.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to which the given dimensions apply.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item.

segment.name: Dangerous goods
segment.documentation: DGS, A segment to specify the class of dangerous goods, packing group, etc.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify the dangerous goods technical name and any other additional dangerous goods information.
